package.description: Package for gathering measurements from the robot joints, laser scans, and camera object detections, and using those measurements to calibrate the laser and camera extrinsic parameters and joint offsets. gatherdata.py - gathers the measurements and synchronize the timestamps. Use rosrecord on the newly published topics runperception.m - Reads the synchornized messages and performs the optimization, use rosplay on the bag files.
package.author: Rosen Diankov (rdiankov@cs.cmu.edu)
